Interface to control a Pololu controller. The interface provides the basic functions for the control of servo motors. More...

Detailed Description

Interface to control a Pololu controller. The interface provides the basic functions for the control of servo motors.

Definition at line 21 of file Pololu.hpp.

Member Function Documentation

◆ getErrors()

virtual unsigned short IPololu::getErrors ( )
pure virtual

Reads and returns all currently detected error codes.

Returns
unsigned short. Errors codes represented as bit-codes.

Implemented in Pololu.

◆ getMovingState()

virtual bool IPololu::getMovingState ( )
pure virtual

Returns the moving state of all motors the control board is connected with. If an error occurs an exception is thrown.

Returns
bool. Return value is false if all motors don't move anymore, otherwise return value is true.

Implemented in Pololu.

◆ getPosition()

virtual unsigned short IPololu::getPosition ( unsigned short  servoID)
pure virtual

Delivers the position value the specified motor is target at. If an error occurs an exception is thrown.

Parameters
unsignedshort servoID. ID of the servo motor.
unsignedshort tragetPos. Target position to be reached.
Returns
unsigned short is undefined.

Implemented in Pololu.
